onchain_metadata.name: FORK YEAH 05
Dedication: “I hope that we can honor [Vasil’s] legacy
by, while in this era, planting a lot of seeds
and growing a lot of trees.
I’m very glad that he was able to teach so many
in our ecosystem so much and he was a great
description: for the VASIL Hard-Fork Combinator Event.
Also known as a Chain Upgrade Event (CUE), the Vasil Era
brings a number of new features to Cardano, including
reference inputs, inline datums, reference scripts,
datums and redeemers, a data serialization primitive,
script collateral adjustments, more diffusion pipelining,
optimized security, and removal of the ‘d’ parameter.
These various improvements will make a substantial
contribution to the performance and scalability
